HomePage.howItWorksStep1: We create a public "tinymind-blog" repository in your GitHub.
HomePage.howItWorksStep2: Your new blog and thoughts will be automatically saved in this repository.
HomePage.howItWorksStep3: Your data is stored only on GitHub, independently of this site.

metadata.title: TinyMind - Write and sync your blog posts & thoughts with one-click GitHub sign-in
metadata.description: Write and preserve your blogs, thoughts, and notes effortlessly. Sign in with GitHub to automatically sync your content to your own repository, ensuring your ideas are safely stored as long as GitHub exists.
